Articles.Content:
I bought KSP a long time ago, back in 2013 I think - but when I tried to play it, everything was hard and unintuitive, so I decided I'll wait until the game is finished. I got back to it in March 2015 after watching some youtube videos and began playing 0.90. I spent hours trying to get things into orbit, then to the Mun, then to dock two things together... Now I have more than 400 hours played, at least according to Steam I was reading those forums for a long time, now I finally decided to register.

Some of my constructions:

Elephant Base with 4 rovers (0.90):

Medium Supply Ship "Buran" (1.04):

Welcome to the forums. Its good to see long time players *finally* taking the plunge and joining us.

KSP is addictive, we can help... KSP anonymous.... we don't cure you of your addiction.... we encourage it.
